title: Mana Flows
effect: Add xxSORCERY asset to each eldritch location.

title: Snow Flurries
effect: All characters in rural or wilderness locations take 1xxBODY.

title: Brutal Cold
effect: All characters in rural or wilderness locations take 2xxBODY.

title: Blizzard
effect: Discard all units. All characters in rural or wilderness locations take 3xxBODY.

title: Trade Fair
effect: Add xxTECHNOLOGY asset to each urban location.

title: Tournament of the Autarch
effect: Add xxESPIONAGE asset to each xxEMPIRE location.

title: Heavy Rains
effect: Each player discards their lowest valued action die.

title: Traveling Weather
effect: Movement costs 1 less this turn, to a minimum of 1.

title: Heat Wave
effect: All characters in urban locations take 2xxBODY.

title: Harvest Festivals
effect: Add xxDIPLOMACY asset to each rural location.

title: Bountiful Harvest
effect: Add xxSTABILITY asset to each xxREDBANK location.

title: Gathering Storm
effect: Draw and place an obstacle using lowest progress card, discard progress card.

title: Mana Backlash
effect: Discard all foes in xxREDBANK. All characters in eldritch locations take 3xxPSYCHE.
